resources.string:
To use this application, you must set your VoIP.ms portal email address and API password in Settings. If you do not know what an API password is, see Help.

After setting your email and password, you will also need to pick an SMS-enabled DID using the Select DID menu in order to receive texts.

You may also wish to enable push notifications. For more information, see Help.
Enable push notifications using the developer\'s Google Cloud Messaging server
Delete local copy of SMS database
